price: (11) Leave Me with the one I created alone[1791]
footnotes: [1791]- i.e., without wealth or children.  The reference is to al-Waleed bin al-Mugheerah, who after inclining toward the Qur’ān, denied it publicly in order to win the approval of the Quraysh.
